title: I have to be strong. I have to be brave. I have no right to whine.

contents:
CALENDAR OF EVENTS Here you will always find what exactly we plan to spend in the near future!
We are always glad to see you at our events!
Children's holiday reading book January 5, 2023 If you are in Trier, come and discover and listen to interesting stories, read holiday tales and get into the Christmas spirit! Sign up I have to be strong. I have to be brave. I have no right to whine.

Creative team "FREE BIRDS" The mysterious ancient Trier attracts talented people, binds and unites them. That's right, previously unknown people - were able to become a single incredible team. Music, dancing, singing, creative skills - everything is in abundance. Thanks to the union, we manage to introduce Europeans to Ukrainian culture and folklore.
Anna Stetska singer
Liza Kondratenko singer, musician
Margarita Nagorna singer
Angelina Dotsenko singer
Sofia Deriguz bandurista, singer

HOW DID IT ALL START? The history of our project begins with a burning desire, or rather with several desires:
Provide help and support to those who remained in their native land!
Do not stay away from the war! Protect the rear! Strengthen the information front!
And the idea was born to demonstrate to the world what Ukraine is, how beautiful and multifaceted it is.
Fall in love with our Motherland because of its greatest treasures: sincere freedom-loving people, original traditions, folklore, experience!
title: About us

contents: I want to help I need help
title: Help
I can help
I need help

contents: We are honored to communicate with some of the best people and companies in the world! Why are we saying this? Because only such people and companies cannot stand aside when people are suffering. When you have principles, you have your own thoughts and your own views. If you are willing to sacrifice your own piece of bread for others who cannot buy it. Thank you for supporting us! For believing in our projects and helping to implement them.
title: Our Partners

contents:
No one deserve to experience grief, pain and despair alone. Sometimes it's just as hard for others. And it seems that there is no one to share your worries and anxieties with. Because it's bad for everyone. Because I'm afraid to get bored. Many different "Because".
But a person needs a person, the one who can withstand the storm of emotions, difficult and unpleasant.
And a psychologist can become such a person.
title: Psychological help

contents:
